sentence.Network_en: Plant cells are subdivided into several morphologically distinct compartments.
sentence.Network_cn: 植物细胞进一步分为一些形态上不同的空间间隔.

sentence.Network_en: In their original description these types are morphologically distinct enough to classify them as subspecies.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他们最早的论述中,这些类型在形态上是截然不同的,完全可以把它们分成亚种.

sentence.Network_en: The degree of comparison can be expressed morphologically or syntactically.
sentence.Network_cn: 比较级可以通过词形或者语义来实现.
